p: To provide additional support for a causative relationship between Ntwetwe virus infection and encephalopathy, a clinically-relevant Ntwetwe virus infection was hypothesized to elicit a host immune response similar to CNS infections with known viral pathogens. A panel of 11 inflammatory biomarkers was measured in CSF and plasma. The concentrations in plasma were compared to those of reference patients with encephalopathies of varying etiologies (see Supplementary Methods).
